thread.section_title: Devonvale Golf & Wine Estate - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 4 weeks long stay with unlimited golf feb-mars
thread.title_full: 4 weeks long stay with unlimited golf feb-mars - Review of Devonvale Golf & Wine Estate, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: perl193
title: 4 weeks long stay with unlimited golf feb-mars
text:
The furniture in the living room and kitchen are substandard. Armchairs could not sit in when the padding was completely worn down or away. The couch was uncomfortable and rundown and we used the garden furniture instead to sit in because they were more comfortable. Kitchen furniture is hard and should have pads on which they are made of wood.
Dinners did not always correspond to the expected standard if compared with the vineyards in the surrounding area such as Simopnsig and Delheim. This meant that we ate most meals at other restaurants.
Otherwise, we are very happy with our stay at your place.
